sentences.simplifiedText: 他经历的苦难让他的性格变得更为坚韧。
sentences.traditionalText: 他經歷的苦難讓他的性格變得更為堅韌。
sentences.pinyin: Tā jīnglì de kǔnàn ràng tā de xìnggé biàn dé gèng wéi jiānrèn.
sentences.translation: The hardships he experienced made his character even more tenacious.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我经历了许多苦难才成功。
sentences.traditionalText: 我經歷了許多苦難才成功。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jīnglìle xǔduō kǔnàn cái chénggōng.
sentences.translation: I went through a lot of pain before I succeeded.

sentences.pinyin: tā de huà kǔ le wǒ.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他的遗忘和冷淡让我心里感到无比苦。
sentences.traditionalText: 他的遺忘和冷淡讓我心裡感到無比苦。
sentences.pinyin: tā de yíwàng hé lěngdàn ràng wǒ xīnlǐ gǎndào wúbǐ kǔ.
sentences.translation: His forgetfulness and indifference made me feel unbearably hurt in my heart.
